IVisualizationClientRaw (ITF)
IVisualizationClientRaw (ITF)
Â¶
INTERFACE IVisualizationClientRaw EXTENDS
IVisualizationClient
Extension interface that can be used for accessing the raw client data.
This interface should only be used when the ClientDataPointer is needed
for accessing other functionalities where no alternative exists in VisuUtils.
